name: Waterside at Pine Island
description:
ABOUT THE HOME ENERGY RATING SCALE
The HERS (Home Energy Rating System) Index allows buyers to compare the relative energy efficiency of different homes. The HERS Index home energy rating is determined by an independent RESNET-certified home energy rater ("Rater"). The lower a home’s score, the more energy efficient it is in comparison to the HERS referenced home. For every one-point decrease in the HERS Index score, there is a corresponding one percent (1%) reduction in energy consumption as compared to a home with a HERS Index of 100. A home with a HERS score of 100 reflects a home built to 2006 IEEC Building Codes. See the bottom of this page for more information on HERS scores.

amenities.name: Refined luxury
amenities.description: Refined luxury meets the outdoors, with private docks and boat ramp for seamless lake access, perfect for boating and sunset cruises.

amenities.name: Home Designs
amenities.description: Enjoy the benefits of a 10-year limited structural warranty, alongside Pulte Homes’ 5-Year Water Infiltration and Internal Leak Coverage—a testament to the confidence in quality and durability offered here.

amenities.name: Pulte’s Build
amenities.description: Pulte’s Build Quality Experience process upholds the highest standards in craftsmanship, creating a legacy of excellence and satisfaction.

amenities.name: Lake enthusiasts
amenities.description: Lake enthusiasts will appreciate proximity to prestigious clubs such as the Columbia Sailing Club, while Lighthouse Marina offers a convenient home for your boat, just minutes away.

amenities.name: surrounding area
amenities.description: The surrounding area offers a wealth of outdoor escapes, including Saluda Shoals Park, Irmo Community Park, and Irmo Town Park

amenities.name: Dining options
amenities.description: Dining options abound, from Midwood Smokehouse to Publico, Smoked, and Burger Tavern 77, allowing you to explore a vibrant culinary scene minutes from your home.

amenities.name: Plan enriching
amenities.description: Plan enriching excursions to Riverbanks Zoo & Garden or the Columbia Museum of Art for a touch of culture.

amenities.name: Every new
amenities.description: Every new Pulte home is a smart home, offering superior Wi-Fi coverage and a full suite of automation options that truly bring your home to life.

amenities.name: Personalize your
amenities.description: Personalize your new home at Waterside at Pine Island to create a unique oasis that perfectly reflects your style and embraces the serene lakeside lifestyle.
